meanings.definition: A shrub native to South America.
meanings.sent1: The matico in our garden has beautiful green leaves.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the matico plant in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid nuts in the matico bush.
meanings.sent4: The matico stood tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the matico filled the air with freshness.

meanings.definition: A medicinal plant used for its astringent properties.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother brews tea with matico for its healing powers.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist recommended matico for its medicinal benefits.
meanings.sent3: The cat sneezed after sniffing the matico remedy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a soothing balm, like matico for the soul.
meanings.sent5: The matico leaves were a natural remedy for many ailments.

meanings.definition: A reddish-brown dye derived from the leaves of the matico plant.
meanings.sent1: She dyed her fabric with matico to achieve a warm color.
meanings.sent2: The artisan used matico dye to create beautiful patterns.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain turned the matico dye into a muddy mess.
meanings.sent4: His words were stained with the matico of truth.
meanings.sent5: The matico dye transformed the cloth into a work of art.
